official_title: A bill to deauthorize the Lafayette Dam and Reservoir, Big Pine Dam and Reservoir, Clifty Creek Dam and Reservoir, Big Walnut Dam and Reservoir, and Big Blue Dam and Reservoir in the State of Indiana.

summary.text: Deauthorizes the Lafayette Dam and Reservoir, the Big Pine Dam and Reservoir, the Clifty Creek Dam and Reservoir, the Big Walnut Dam and Reservoir, and the Big Blue Dam and Reservoir, Indiana.

titles.title: A bill to deauthorize the Lafayette Dam and Reservoir, Big Pine Dam and Reservoir, Clifty Creek Dam and Reservoir, Big Walnut Dam and Reservoir, and Big Blue Dam and Reservoir in the State of Indiana.
